actions.name: Dazzling

cost.trigger:
Trigger: A creature within range uses a [Priority X] or [Interrupt X] Action.

Effect: The triggering creature loses -1 ACC for 3 Activations and loses 1 PP if it was a [Priority X] action, and 3 PP if it was an [Interrupt X] action.
